revised_title: Magnetisation Limit of Iron: A Comparison of Single-Pole and Double-Pole Methods
tldr: The author conducted experiments to determine the magnetisation limit of iron using single-pole and double-pole methods. The results showed that the single-pole method provided a more accurate measurement of the magnetisation limit. The tractive force increased with the length of the wire up to 10 inches, beyond which no higher degree of magnetisation was obtained.
